-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| wi(wceq(cfv(clsi, c0), cfv(clsp, c0)), wceq(cfv(clsi, c0), cfv(clsp, c0)))

body.origin: |- wi(wceq(cfv(clsi, c0), cfv(clsp, c0)), wceq(cfv(clsi, c0), cfv(clsp, c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wbr(cfv(clsp, c0), cle, cfv(clsi, c0)), wceq(cfv(clsi, c0), cfv(clsp, c0))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wral(s0, cr, wrex(s1, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf), wne(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(s1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), emptycls))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)

comment: The inferior limit is greater than or equal to the superior limit if and only if they are equal. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)
